summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Distribution Manager application. All backend APIs working correctly with 100% success rate. Frontend functionality working well with minor HTML structure warnings that don't affect user experience.

design_issues.issue: HTML hydration warnings in console - div elements nested incorrectly within table structure
design_issues.note: Does not affect functionality, only console warnings

passed_tests: Agent creation and management (create, list, delete)
CSV file upload with proper validation (FirstName, Phone, Notes columns)
Smart distribution logic (distributes records equally among agents)
Assignment retrieval for admin (can see all assignments)
Agent login and role-based access control
Agent dashboard shows only their assigned items
Agent cannot access admin endpoints (403 forbidden)
Frontend login flow for both admin and agent
Admin dashboard with stats cards and navigation
Agent management UI (add, view, delete agents)
File upload interface with validation messages
Assignments view with all assignments and distribution stats

success_percentage.frontend: 100% (all core functionality working, only minor HTML structure warnings)
